info:eu-repo/classification/acm/C.2 COMPUTER-COMMUNICATION NETWORKS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This document is the first internal report (version A) describing the platform official release. It provides links to the software as well as a brief explanation about the management of the universAAL releases. This document has been prepared by reviewing the first release of D2.3-A..
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: ReAAL - make it ReAAL. Deliverable D2.2a, 2014.
